LanguageData.AncientAmmoStack.label: ancient ammo box
LanguageData.AncientAmmoStack.description: A container of ancient ammunition. It's empty and any remaining rounds are corroded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientAntenna.label: ancient antenna
LanguageData.AncientAntenna.description: A rusted antenna used to transmit long-forgotten communications.
LanguageData.AncientArmchair.label: ancient armchair
LanguageData.AncientArmchair.description: A faded and torn armchair. It's unusable in its current state.
LanguageData.AncientAutocannonTurret.label: broken autocannon turret
LanguageData.AncientAutocannonTurret.description: An autocannon turret with a shattered barrel. The targeting system is missing and all the components are rusted and bent to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientBarrierLong.label: large concrete barrier
LanguageData.AncientBarrierLong.description: A concrete barrier used to block the path of vehicles.
LanguageData.AncientBathtub.label: cracked bathtub
LanguageData.AncientBathtub.description: A bathtub with deep cracks and rust stains. It's completely unusable.
LanguageData.AncientCardboardBox.label: old cardboard box
LanguageData.AncientCardboardBox.description: An soggy cardboard box filled with old detritus.
LanguageData.AncientChembarrel.label: ancient chembarrel
LanguageData.AncientChembarrel.description: A rusted barrel that once stored chemfuel. It's empty and corroded.
LanguageData.AncientChembarrelPallet.label: ancient chembarrel pallet
LanguageData.AncientChembarrelPallet.description: A stack of rusted barrels on a decayed pallet. Any valuable fuel leaked out long ago.
LanguageData.AncientChemtruck.label: ancient chemtruck
LanguageData.AncientChemtruck.description: An abandoned chemfuel transport truck. Any usable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientColdStorage.label: ancient cold storage
LanguageData.AncientColdStorage.description: An old refrigeration unit, now rusted shut. Any contents have long since decayed to dust.
LanguageData.AncientCraneArm.label: ruined crane arm
LanguageData.AncientCraneArm.description: A rusted crane arm, twisted and broken.
LanguageData.AncientCraneArmSmall.label: ruined crane arm
LanguageData.AncientCraneArmSmall.description: A smaller chunk of a crane arm, snapped and rusted.
LanguageData.AncientCraneBase.label: ruined crane base
LanguageData.AncientCraneBase.description: The base of a large industrial crane.
LanguageData.AncientCraneColumn.label: ruined crane column
LanguageData.AncientCraneColumn.description: A vertical support column from a ruined crane. It's rusted and no longer stable.
LanguageData.AncientCratePallet.label: ancient crate pallet
LanguageData.AncientCratePallet.description: A pallet for stacking and transporting crates. The contents have been scavenged long ago.
LanguageData.AncientDestroyedConsole.label: ancient destroyed console
LanguageData.AncientDestroyedConsole.description: A ruined console. It is now completely inoperable. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientDestroyedConsoleLarge.label: ancient destroyed console
LanguageData.AncientDestroyedConsoleLarge.description: A ruined console. It is now completely inoperable. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientDoubleBed.label: rusted double bed
LanguageData.AncientDoubleBed.description: A double bed with a sagging, rusted frame. It's better than sleeping on the ground, but just barely.
LanguageData.AncientDrillPlatform.label: ancient drill rig
LanguageData.AncientDrillPlatform.description: A device meant for drilling deep into the earth. Any valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientExcavator.label: ancient excavator
LanguageData.AncientExcavator.description: The remains of a mining vehicle. The valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientFilingCabinet.label: rusted filing cabinet
LanguageData.AncientFilingCabinet.description: A corroded filing cabinet. There's nothing useful left inside.
LanguageData.AncientForklift.label: ruined forklift
LanguageData.AncientForklift.description: A broken forklift, rusted and missing parts. It's far too damaged to be repaired.
LanguageData.AncientIndustrialShelf.label: ancient industrial shelf
LanguageData.AncientIndustrialShelf.description: An industrial shelf covered in rust. It offers nothing of value.
LanguageData.AncientIndustrialTruck.label: rusted industrial truck
LanguageData.AncientIndustrialTruck.description: An industrial truck, heavily rusted and abandoned. The engine is beyond repair.
LanguageData.AncientLockers.label: rusted lockers
LanguageData.AncientLockers.description: A set of metal lockers, heavily rusted and bent. They've been thoroughly looted.
LanguageData.AncientMediumContainer.label: ancient container
LanguageData.AncientMediumContainer.description: A rusted shipping container. It's completely empty.
LanguageData.AncientMetalCrate.label: rusted metal crate
LanguageData.AncientMetalCrate.description: A metal crate, now rusted shut. It's empty and worthless.
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryBarrier.label: ancient military barrier
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryBarrier.description: A concrete barrier once used for military roadblocks.
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryGeneratorSmall.label: ancient military generator
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryGeneratorSmall.descriptio: A small rusted generator. The fuel tank is empty and the engine is beyond repair.
LanguageData.AncientMortar.label: busted mortar
LanguageData.AncientMortar.description: A shattered mortar emplacement. It's smashed and will never work again.
LanguageData.AncientOpenContainer.label: rusted open container
LanguageData.AncientOpenContainer.description: A rusted shipping container. Its contents are worthless.
LanguageData.AncientPipe.label: ancient pipe
LanguageData.AncientPipe.description: A segment of old corroded piping.
LanguageData.AncientPlantPot.label: ancient plant pot
LanguageData.AncientPlantPot.description: A large cracked pot with dead soil. Nothing can grow here any more.
LanguageData.AncientRustedMicrowave.label: rusted microwave
LanguageData.AncientRustedMicrowave.description: An ancient microwave covered in rust. It's beyond repair.
LanguageData.AncientShelf.label: ancient shelf
LanguageData.AncientShelf.description: An ancient shelf. It holds nothing of interest.
LanguageData.AncientShower.label: cracked shower
LanguageData.AncientShower.description: A broken shower stall. The plumbing is corroded and the ceramics are shattered.
LanguageData.AncientSimpleResearchBench.label: ancient research bench
LanguageData.AncientSimpleResearchBench.description: An old, rudimentary research bench with corroded tools and faded notes. Nothing of value remains.
LanguageData.AncientSingleBed.label: rusted bed
LanguageData.AncientSingleBed.description: A single bed frame with rusted metal and a torn mattress. It's better than sleeping on the ground, but just barely.
LanguageData.AncientSmallContainer.label: ancient container
LanguageData.AncientSmallContainer.description: A rusted shipping container. It's completely empty.
LanguageData.AncientSmallShelf.label: ancient small shelf
LanguageData.AncientSmallShelf.description: An ancient shelf. There's nothing useful left on it.
LanguageData.AncientTableBrewery.label: ancient brewery
LanguageData.AncientTableBrewery.description: A dilapidated brewing table once used for fermentation. The equipment is rusted beyond use.
LanguageData.AncientTableButcher.label: ancient butcher table
LanguageData.AncientTableButcher.description: A broken butcher's table littered with old stains.
LanguageData.AncientTableDrugLab.label: ancient drug lab
LanguageData.AncientTableDrugLab.description: A crumbling lab table with shattered glassware. The equipment is useless and contaminated.
LanguageData.AncientTableMachining.label: ancient machining table
LanguageData.AncientTableMachining.description: A rusted machining table covered in debris. All useful parts have been scavenged.
LanguageData.AncientTableSmithingElectric.label: ancient electric smithy
LanguageData.AncientTableSmithingElectric.description: A ruined electric smithy with frayed wires and scorched surfaces. It's beyond repair.
LanguageData.AncientTableSmithingFueled.label: ancient fueled smithy
LanguageData.AncientTableSmithingFueled.description: An ancient smithy that once burned fuel for crafting. Now, it's covered in soot and rust.
LanguageData.AncientTableStoveElectric.label: ancient electric stove
LanguageData.AncientTableStoveElectric.description: An old electric stove with shattered heating elements. It's far too damaged to use.
LanguageData.AncientTableStoveFueled.label: ancient fueled stove
LanguageData.AncientTableStoveFueled.description: A rusted cooking stove. It's beyond unusable.
LanguageData.AncientTableTailorElectric.label: ancient electric tailor bench
LanguageData.AncientTableTailorElectric.description: A ruined tailor's bench with torn fabric and broken tools. It's beyond salvage.
LanguageData.AncientTableTailorHand.label: ancient hand tailor bench
LanguageData.AncientTableTailorHand.description: A simple tailor's bench with splintered wood and rusted needles. Nothing useful remains.
LanguageData.AncientTunnelerClaw.label: ancient tunneler claw
LanguageData.AncientTunnelerClaw.description: The claw of an ancient mining mechanoid. All the parts are degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientTunnelerHusk.label: ancient tunneler husk
LanguageData.AncientTunnelerHusk.description: The remains of an ancient mining mechanoid. Its complex parts are all degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientTV.label: busted television
LanguageData.AncientTV.description: A shattered television set. The screen is broken and the electronics are stripped out.
LanguageData.AncientUraniumSlugTurret.label: broken uranium slug turret
LanguageData.AncientUraniumSlugTurret.description: A heavy turret designed to fire uranium slugs. The mechanism is smashed and the ammo is depleted.
LanguageData.AncientWindTurbineBody.label: ancient wind turbine
LanguageData.AncientWindTurbineBody.description: A toppled wind turbine with broken blades. It's been scavenged for parts long ago.
LanguageData.AncientWoodenCrate.label: old wooden crate
LanguageData.AncientWoodenCrate.description: A weathered wooden crate. It's empty, and the wood is brittle.
LanguageData.RubblePile.label: rubble pile
LanguageData.RubblePile.description: The crumbled remains of an ancient structure.
